arts.ttl: Stoke vs Coventry predictions: Potters can pick up a point
arts.sum: Stoke host Coventry in the Championship on Saturday and Dan Childs anticipates a close contest with neither team coming out on top.

arts.ttl: Abdoulie Manneh: Coventry City joined by Stoke City in transfer hunt
arts.sum: Coventry City will face competition from Stoke City in the race for Mjällby AIF’s Abdoulie Manneh, according to Fotboll Direkt. Three days ago, Expressen reported Coventry City were in negotiations with the Swedish club for the 21-year-old. They also stated Frank Lampard’s side were hoping to close the deal in the next few weeks. On The post Abdoulie Manneh: Coventry City joined by Stoke City in transfer hunt appeared first on Sport Witness.
